headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://www.googletagmanager.com https://*.google-analytics.com; connect-src 'self' https://www.googletagmanager.com https://*.google-analytics.com; img-src 'self' data: https://*.google-analytics.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; frame-src 'none'; object-src 'none'
